name: Basic Modification
summary: You've learned to modify your innovation in order to enhance its capabilities beyond what an ordinary piece of equipment can accomplish.
description:
You've learned to modify your innovation in order to enhance its capabilities beyond what an ordinary piece of equipment can accomplish. You gain a basic modification of your choice for your innovation (page 16). Your innovation must meet any requirements for the modification you choose, as normal.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
